segments.text: Welcome to our company , My name is Jon Dahl Green . I'm in charge of the export department . Let me give you my business card .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not bad , but I'm a little tired .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here's your schedule . After this meeting , we will visit the factory and have another meeting with the production manager . And you'll be having dinner with our director .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Could you arrange a meeting with your boss ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course . I've arranged it at 10 0 ' clock tomorrow morning .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , shall we get down to business ' .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure , did you receive the sample we sent last week ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , we finished the evaluation of it . If the price is acceptable we would like to order now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm very glad to hear that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What's your best price for that item ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think the price is a little high , can't you reduce it
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm afraid we can't . $ 12.50 is our rock bottom price . If you purchase more than 10,000 units we can reduce it to $ 12.00 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I'll accept the price and place an initial order of 10,000 units .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Very good . It's been a pleasure to do business with you , Mr . Smith .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The pleasure is ours . Can you deliver the goods by March 31 ?
segments.speaker: S2
